set_ship_text.name: Keloi Gitosz
set_ship_text.desc: Heavily modified Kralien Dreadnought.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Kralien Dreadnought with heavily modulated shields. Commanded by Celestial Guardian Karanu Gerkna. Specials: HET Teleport AntiMine AntiTorp Drones ShldDrain LongRangeJump

set_ship_text.name: Black Bertha
set_ship_text.desc: Upgraded Axe class
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Commanded by Black Bertha, daughter of the infamous pirate Black Billy, who was long wanted for piracy, hijacking, kidnapping, smuggling, illegal whaling, illegal dumping, deliberatly interfering with wireless telegraphy, anti-social behaviour and disorderly conduct before finally being brought to justice by TSN forces. Specials: Warp HET AntiMine AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: TSN Verdant
set_ship_text.desc: TSN Athena Class.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Flagship of the 2nd Space Fleet, 1st Battle Division. Commanded by Flt. Cpt. Min Mwenya. Specials: HET Warp AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: TSN Whispers of Freedom
set_ship_text.desc: Modified Bulk Cargo.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Able to carry approximately 3500 souls.

set_ship_text.name: TSN Verdant
set_ship_text.desc: TSN Athena Class.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Flagship of the 2nd Space Fleet, 1st Battle Division. Commanded by Rear Adm. Min Mwenya. Specials: HET Warp AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: TSN Verdant
set_ship_text.desc: TSN Athena Class.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Flagship of the 2nd Space Fleet, 1st Battle Division. Commanded by Rear Adm. Min Mwenya. Specials: HET Warp AntiTorp Drones

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantSin
set_variable.value: (16 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi - S21_VerdantAngle))/(5 * S21_pi * S21_pi - 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi - S21_VerdantAngle))

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantCos
set_variable.value: (S21_pi * S21_pi - 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)/(S21_pi * S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantSin
set_variable.value: (16 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi - S21_VerdantAngle))/(5 * S21_pi * S21_pi - 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi - S21_VerdantAngle))

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantCos
set_variable.value: (4 * S21_pi * S21_pi - 8 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_pi + 3 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)/(S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle - 2 * S21_pi * S21_VerdantAngle + 2 * S21_pi * S21_pi)

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantSin
set_variable.value: (16 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle))/(5 * S21_pi * S21_pi + 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle))

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantCos
set_variable.value: (4 * S21_pi * S21_pi + 8 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_pi + 3 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)/(S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle + 2 * S21_pi * S21_VerdantAngle + 2 * S21_pi * S21_pi)

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantSin
set_variable.value: (16 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle))/(5 * S21_pi * S21_pi + 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * (S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle))

set_variable.name: S21_VerdantCos
set_variable.value: (S21_pi * S21_pi - 4 * S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)/(S21_pi * S21_pi + S21_VerdantAngle * S21_VerdantAngle)

set_ship_text.name: Wisdom
set_ship_text.desc: Reinforced presidential luxury liner.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Vessel of President Amandu Liam. Specials: Warp AntiMine AntiTorp

set_ship_text.name: Ubuntu
set_ship_text.desc: Decommissioned USFP Patrol Boat, in civilian use.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Vessel of Former President Kuyas Tolunay. Specials: Warp AntiMine AntiTorp
